titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the anniversary meeting of the sons of clergy-men in the church of S. Mary le Bow on Thursday, Decemb. 2, 1686 by Henry Dove.
titleStmt.author: Dove, Henry, 1640-1695.

notesStmt.note: "Printed at the desire of the right worshipful the Stewards of the Feast, to whom it is humbly presented."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
